Windlord:

Windlord took tha little one in arms and he sat down and sat the 
little one his legs and huged her while he said tryin to confort 
her "Perhaps your mom gave you a way to cure the Plague and it could 
help us to face it... I don't like force you to give me that cubes, 
little one, but you can do a great help to this base and the bots 
that live here if you let us examine one cube... You decide"




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
wrote:
> Camoflage::
> 
> She acted nervous. "Well, I'm not supposed to tell. My mom said 
that 
> if I ever got sick I was to take one and I'd feel better. But I 
> wasn't supposed to tell anyone about them. It's the last thing 
that 
> my mommy gave me."  she sobbed softly for a bit. "So, your not 
> supposed to know about the cubes. They're mine and mommy's secret."
